name: ldapusercreation
description: This pipeline is used to create users and groups in the openldap

parameterConfig.description: user need to pass the value for user so that it the user and groups will be created in ldap
parameterConfig.name: user

args:
LDAP_BASE="dc=example,dc=org" 
LDAP_PASS="opsmxadmin123" 
LDAP_HOST="ldap://isd-openldap:389"
x=`ldapsearch -x -H  $LDAP_HOST -w $LDAP_PASS  -D "cn=admin,$LDAP_BASE" -b $LDAP_BASE "(cn=$user)" | grep ^"cn:" | grep -w $user | wc -l`
if [ $x -gt 0 ]
then
echo user already exists
echo SPINNAKER_PROPERTY_USEREXISTS="true"
exit 5
else
echo SPINNAKER_PROPERTY_USEREXISTS="false"
fi
export username=$user
export usergroup=$user_group
echo $username
echo $usergroup

userpwd=$(date| md5sum | awk '{print $1}')
echo $userpwd
rm -rf /tmp/user.ldif
cp /root/userbase.ldif /tmp/user.ldif
sed -i -e "s/appleuser/$username/g" /tmp/user.ldif
sed -i -e "s/appledc/example/g" /tmp/user.ldif
sed -i -e  "s/appleorg/org/g" /tmp/user.ldif
sed -i -e "s/userpwd/$userpwd/g" /tmp/user.ldif
sed -i -e  "s/applegroup/$usergroup/g" /tmp/user.ldif
sed -i -e "s/ougroup/groups/g" /tmp/user.ldif

cat /tmp/user.ldif

ldapadd  -x -H  $LDAP_HOST  -w  $LDAP_PASS  -D "cn=admin,$LDAP_BASE" -f /tmp/user.ldif
ldapsearch -x -H  $LDAP_HOST -w $LDAP_PASS  -D  "cn=admin,$LDAP_BASE" -b $LDAP_BASE "(cn=*)"
echo SPINNAKER_PROPERTY_USERNAME=$username
echo SPINNAKER_PROPERTY_USERPASSWORD=$userpwd
containers.name: ldapservice

data.userbase.ldif:
dn: cn=appleuser,dc=appledc,dc=appleorg
objectClass: simpleSecurityObject
objectClass: organizationalRole
cn: appleuser
userPassword: userpwd

dn: cn=applegroup,ou=ougroup,dc=appledc,dc=appleorg
objectClass: groupOfNames
cn: applegroup
description: read and execute group
member: cn=admin,dc=appledc,dc=appleorg
member: cn=appleuser,dc=appledc,dc=appleorg
